trans-unit.source: Pressing Tab in the current editor will move focus to the next focusable element. Toggle this behavior by pressing {0}.

trans-unit.source: Background color for the highlight of line at the cursor position.

trans-unit.source: Background color of highlighted ranges, like by quick open and find features. The color must not be opaque so as not to hide underlying decorations.
trans-unit.target: Background color of highlighted ranges, like by quick open and find features. The color must not be opaque so as not to hide underlying decorations.

trans-unit.source: Background color of the border around highlighted ranges.
trans-unit.target: Vurgulanmış alanın etrafındaki kenarlıkların arka plan rengi.

trans-unit.source: Background color of highlighted symbol, like for go to definition or go next/previous symbol. The color must not be opaque so as not to hide underlying decorations.
trans-unit.target: Background color of highlighted symbol, like for go to definition or go next/previous symbol. The color must not be opaque so as not to hide underlying decorations.

trans-unit.source: Color of the editor cursor.

trans-unit.source: The background color of the editor cursor. Allows customizing the color of a character overlapped by a block cursor.

trans-unit.source: Border color of unnecessary (unused) source code in the editor.
trans-unit.target: Border color of unnecessary (unused) source code in the editor.

trans-unit.source: Opacity of unnecessary (unused) source code in the editor. For example, "#000000c0" will render the code with 75% opacity. For high contrast themes, use the 'editorUnnecessaryCode.border' theme color to underline unnecessary code instead of fading it out.
trans-unit.target: Opacity of unnecessary (unused) source code in the editor. For example, "#000000c0" will render the code with 75% opacity. For high contrast themes, use the 'editorUnnecessaryCode.border' theme color to underline unnecessary code instead of fading it out.

trans-unit.source: Overview ruler marker color for range highlights. The color must not be opaque so as not to hide underlying decorations.
trans-unit.target: Overview ruler marker color for range highlights. The color must not be opaque so as not to hide underlying decorations.

trans-unit.source: The number of spaces a tab is equal to. This setting is overridden based on the file contents when `#editor.detectIndentation#` is on.

trans-unit.source: Insert spaces when pressing `Tab`. This setting is overridden based on the file contents when `#editor.detectIndentation#` is on.
trans-unit.target: Tab tuşuna basınca boşluk ekle. Bu ayar, `#editor.detectIndentation#` açıkken dosya içeriğine bağlı olarak geçersiz kılınır.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether `#editor.tabSize#` and `#editor.insertSpaces#` will be automatically detected when a file is opened based on the file contents.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether `#editor.tabSize#` and `#editor.insertSpaces#` will be automatically detected when a file is opened based on the file contents.

trans-unit.source: Remove trailing auto inserted whitespace.
trans-unit.target: Remove trailing auto inserted whitespace.

trans-unit.source: Special handling for large files to disable certain memory intensive features.
trans-unit.target: Yoğun bellek kullanan belirli özellikleri devre dışı bırakacak şekilde büyük dosyalarla özel olarak ilgilenilmesi.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether completions should be computed based on words in the document.
trans-unit.target: Tamamlamaların belgedeki sözcüklere dayalı olarak hesaplanıp hesaplanmayacağını denetler.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the semanticHighlighting is shown for the languages that support it.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether the semanticHighlighting is shown for the languages that support it.

trans-unit.source: Keep peek editors open even when double clicking their content or when hitting `Escape`.
trans-unit.target: Keep peek editors open even when double clicking their content or when hitting `Escape`.

trans-unit.source: Lines above this length will not be tokenized for performance reasons
trans-unit.target: Lines above this length will not be tokenized for performance reasons

trans-unit.source: Timeout in milliseconds after which diff computation is cancelled. Use 0 for no timeout.
trans-unit.target: Timeout in milliseconds after which diff computation is cancelled. Use 0 for no timeout.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the diff editor shows the diff side by side or inline.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether the diff editor shows the diff side by side or inline.

trans-unit.source: When enabled, the diff editor ignores changes in leading or trailing whitespace.
trans-unit.target: When enabled, the diff editor ignores changes in leading or trailing whitespace.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the diff editor shows +/- indicators for added/removed changes.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether the diff editor shows +/- indicators for added/removed changes.

trans-unit.source: The editor will be permanently optimized for usage with a Screen Reader.
trans-unit.target: Düzenleyici bir Ekran Okuyucu ile kullanılmak üzere kalıcı olarak optimize edilecektir.

trans-unit.source: The editor will never be optimized for usage with a Screen Reader.
trans-unit.target: Düzenleyici hiçbir zaman bir Ekran Okuyucu ile kullanılmak üzere optimize edilmeyecektir.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the editor should run in a mode where it is optimized for screen readers.
trans-unit.target: Düzenleyicinin ekran okuyucular için optimize edilmiş bir modda çalışıp çalışmayacağını denetler.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether a space character is inserted when commenting.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether a space character is inserted when commenting.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether copying without a selection copies the current line.
trans-unit.target: Bir seçim olmadan geçerli satırı kopyalayıp kopyalamamayı denetler.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the search string in the Find Widget is seeded from the editor selection.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether the search string in the Find Widget is seeded from the editor selection.

trans-unit.source: Never turn on Find in selection automatically (default)
trans-unit.target: Never turn on Find in selection automatically (default)

trans-unit.source: Always turn on Find in selection automatically
trans-unit.target: Always turn on Find in selection automatically

trans-unit.source: Turn on Find in selection automatically when multiple lines of content are selected.
trans-unit.target: Turn on Find in selection automatically when multiple lines of content are selected.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the find operation is carried out on selected text or the entire file in the editor.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether the find operation is carried out on selected text or the entire file in the editor.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the Find Widget should read or modify the shared find clipboard on macOS.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether the Find Widget should read or modify the shared find clipboard on macOS.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the Find Widget should add extra lines on top of the editor. When true, you can scroll beyond the first line when the Find Widget is visible.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether the Find Widget should add extra lines on top of the editor. When true, you can scroll beyond the first line when the Find Widget is visible.

trans-unit.source: Enables/Disables font ligatures.
trans-unit.target: Enables/Disables font ligatures.

trans-unit.source: Explicit font-feature-settings.
trans-unit.target: Explicit font-feature-settings.

trans-unit.source: Configures font ligatures or font features.
trans-unit.target: Configures font ligatures or font features.

trans-unit.source: Controls the font size in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Yazı tipi boyutunu piksel olarak denetler.

trans-unit.source: Show peek view of the results (default)
trans-unit.target: Show peek view of the results (default)

trans-unit.source: Go to the primary result and enable peek-less navigation to others
trans-unit.target: Go to the primary result and enable peek-less navigation to others

trans-unit.source: This setting is deprecated, please use separate settings like 'editor.editor.gotoLocation.multipleDefinitions' or 'editor.editor.gotoLocation.multipleImplementations' instead.
trans-unit.target: This setting is deprecated, please use separate settings like 'editor.editor.gotoLocation.multipleDefinitions' or 'editor.editor.gotoLocation.multipleImplementations' instead.

trans-unit.source: Controls the behavior the 'Go to Definition'-command when multiple target locations exist.
trans-unit.target: Controls the behavior the 'Go to Definition'-command when multiple target locations exist.

trans-unit.source: Controls the behavior the 'Go to Type Definition'-command when multiple target locations exist.
trans-unit.target: Controls the behavior the 'Go to Type Definition'-command when multiple target locations exist.

trans-unit.target: Controls the behavior the 'Go to Declaration'-command when multiple target locations exist.

trans-unit.source: Controls the behavior the 'Go to Implementations'-command when multiple target locations exist.
trans-unit.target: Controls the behavior the 'Go to Implementations'-command when multiple target locations exist.

trans-unit.source: Controls the behavior the 'Go to References'-command when multiple target locations exist.
trans-unit.target: Controls the behavior the 'Go to References'-command when multiple target locations exist.

trans-unit.source: Alternative command id that is being executed when the result of 'Go to Definition' is the current location.
trans-unit.target: Alternative command id that is being executed when the result of 'Go to Definition' is the current location.

trans-unit.source: Alternative command id that is being executed when the result of 'Go to Type Definition' is the current location.
trans-unit.target: Alternative command id that is being executed when the result of 'Go to Type Definition' is the current location.

trans-unit.source: Alternative command id that is being executed when the result of 'Go to Declaration' is the current location.

trans-unit.target: Alternative command id that is being executed when the result of 'Go to Implementation' is the current location.

trans-unit.source: Alternative command id that is being executed when the result of 'Go to Reference' is the current location.
trans-unit.target: Alternative command id that is being executed when the result of 'Go to Reference' is the current location.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the hover is shown.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether the hover is shown.

trans-unit.source: Controls the delay in milliseconds after which the hover is shown.
trans-unit.target: Controls the delay in milliseconds after which the hover is shown.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the hover should remain visible when mouse is moved over it.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether the hover should remain visible when mouse is moved over it.

trans-unit.source: Enables the code action lightbulb in the editor.
trans-unit.target: Enables the code action lightbulb in the editor.

trans-unit.source: Controls the line height. Use 0 to compute the line height from the font size.
trans-unit.target: Satır yüksekliğini kontrol eder. Yazı tipi boyutundan satır yüksekliğini hesaplamak için 0 kullanın.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the minimap is shown.
trans-unit.target: Mini haritanın gösterilip gösterilmeyeceğini denetler.

trans-unit.source: The minimap has the same size as the editor contents (and might scroll).
trans-unit.target: The minimap has the same size as the editor contents (and might scroll).

trans-unit.source: The minimap will stretch or shrink as necessary to fill the height of the editor (no scrolling).
trans-unit.target: The minimap will stretch or shrink as necessary to fill the height of the editor (no scrolling).

trans-unit.source: The minimap will shrink as necessary to never be larger than the editor (no scrolling).
trans-unit.target: The minimap will shrink as necessary to never be larger than the editor (no scrolling).

trans-unit.source: Controls the size of the minimap.
trans-unit.target: Controls the size of the minimap.

trans-unit.source: Controls the side where to render the minimap.
trans-unit.target: Mini haritanın görüntüleneceği tarafı denetler.

trans-unit.source: Controls when the minimap slider is shown.
trans-unit.target: Controls when the minimap slider is shown.

trans-unit.source: Scale of content drawn in the minimap: 1, 2 or 3.
trans-unit.target: Scale of content drawn in the minimap: 1, 2 or 3.

trans-unit.source: Render the actual characters on a line as opposed to color blocks.
trans-unit.target: Render the actual characters on a line as opposed to color blocks.

trans-unit.source: Limit the width of the minimap to render at most a certain number of columns.
trans-unit.target: Limit the width of the minimap to render at most a certain number of columns.

trans-unit.source: Controls the amount of space between the top edge of the editor and the first line.
trans-unit.target: Controls the amount of space between the top edge of the editor and the first line.

trans-unit.source: Controls the amount of space between the bottom edge of the editor and the last line.
trans-unit.target: Controls the amount of space between the bottom edge of the editor and the last line.

trans-unit.source: Enables a pop-up that shows parameter documentation and type information as you type.
trans-unit.target: Enables a pop-up that shows parameter documentation and type information as you type.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the parameter hints menu cycles or closes when reaching the end of the list.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether the parameter hints menu cycles or closes when reaching the end of the list.

trans-unit.source: Enable quick suggestions inside strings.
trans-unit.target: Dizelerin içinde hızlı önerileri etkinleştir.

trans-unit.source: Enable quick suggestions inside comments.
trans-unit.target: Yorumların içinde hızlı önerileri etkinleştir.

trans-unit.source: Enable quick suggestions outside of strings and comments.
trans-unit.target: Dizeler ve yorumlar dışında hızlı önerileri etkinleştirin.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether suggestions should automatically show up while typing.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether suggestions should automatically show up while typing.

trans-unit.source: Line numbers are not rendered.
trans-unit.target: Satır numaraları gösterilmez.

trans-unit.source: Line numbers are rendered as absolute number.
trans-unit.target: Satır numaraları mutlak sayı olarak gösterilir.

trans-unit.source: Line numbers are rendered as distance in lines to cursor position.
trans-unit.target: Satır numaraları imlecin konumuna olan uzaklık olarak gösterilir.

trans-unit.source: Line numbers are rendered every 10 lines.
trans-unit.target: Satır numaraları her 10 satırda bir gösterilir.

trans-unit.source: Controls the display of line numbers.
trans-unit.target: Satır numaralarının görüntülenmesini denetler.

trans-unit.source: Number of monospace characters at which this editor ruler will render.
trans-unit.target: Number of monospace characters at which this editor ruler will render.

trans-unit.source: Color of this editor ruler.
trans-unit.target: Color of this editor ruler.

trans-unit.source: Render vertical rulers after a certain number of monospace characters. Use multiple values for multiple rulers. No rulers are drawn if array is empty.
trans-unit.target: Belirli bir eşit genişlikli karakterlerden sonra dikey cetveller göster. Birden çok cetvel için birden çok değer kullanın. Dizi boş ise cetvel gösterilmez.

trans-unit.source: Insert suggestion without overwriting text right of the cursor.
trans-unit.target: Insert suggestion without overwriting text right of the cursor.

trans-unit.source: Insert suggestion and overwrite text right of the cursor.
trans-unit.target: Insert suggestion and overwrite text right of the cursor.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether words are overwritten when accepting completions. Note that this depends on extensions opting into this feature.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether words are overwritten when accepting completions. Note that this depends on extensions opting into this feature.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether filtering and sorting suggestions accounts for small typos.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether filtering and sorting suggestions accounts for small typos.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether sorting favours words that appear close to the cursor.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether sorting favours words that appear close to the cursor.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether remembered suggestion selections are shared between multiple workspaces and windows (needs `#editor.suggestSelection#`).
trans-unit.target: Controls whether remembered suggestion selections are shared between multiple workspaces and windows (needs `#editor.suggestSelection#`).

trans-unit.source: Controls whether an active snippet prevents quick suggestions.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether an active snippet prevents quick suggestions.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether to show or hide icons in suggestions.
trans-unit.target: Önerilerindeki simgelerini göstermeyi veya gizlemeyi denetler.

trans-unit.source: Controls how many suggestions IntelliSense will show before showing a scrollbar (maximum 15).
trans-unit.target: Controls how many suggestions IntelliSense will show before showing a scrollbar (maximum 15).

trans-unit.source: This setting is deprecated, please use separate settings like 'editor.suggest.showKeywords' or 'editor.suggest.showSnippets' instead.
trans-unit.target: This setting is deprecated, please use separate settings like 'editor.suggest.showKeywords' or 'editor.suggest.showSnippets' instead.

trans-unit.source: Controls the visibility of the status bar at the bottom of the suggest widget.
trans-unit.target: Controls the visibility of the status bar at the bottom of the suggest widget.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether suggestions should be accepted on commit characters. For example, in JavaScript, the semi-colon (`;`) can be a commit character that accepts a suggestion and types that character.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether suggestions should be accepted on commit characters. For example, in JavaScript, the semi-colon (`;`) can be a commit character that accepts a suggestion and types that character.

trans-unit.source: Only accept a suggestion with `Enter` when it makes a textual change.
trans-unit.target: Only accept a suggestion with `Enter` when it makes a textual change.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether suggestions should be accepted on `Enter`, in addition to `Tab`. Helps to avoid ambiguity between inserting new lines or accepting suggestions.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether suggestions should be accepted on `Enter`, in addition to `Tab`. Helps to avoid ambiguity between inserting new lines or accepting suggestions.

trans-unit.source: Controls the number of lines in the editor that can be read out by a screen reader. Warning: this has a performance implication for numbers larger than the default.
trans-unit.target: Controls the number of lines in the editor that can be read out by a screen reader. Warning: this has a performance implication for numbers larger than the default.

trans-unit.source: Editor content
trans-unit.target: Düzenleyici içeriği

trans-unit.source: Use language configurations to determine when to autoclose brackets.
trans-unit.target: Use language configurations to determine when to autoclose brackets.

trans-unit.source: Autoclose brackets only when the cursor is to the left of whitespace.
trans-unit.target: Autoclose brackets only when the cursor is to the left of whitespace.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the editor should automatically close brackets after the user adds an opening bracket.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether the editor should automatically close brackets after the user adds an opening bracket.

trans-unit.source: Type over closing quotes or brackets only if they were automatically inserted.
trans-unit.target: Type over closing quotes or brackets only if they were automatically inserted.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the editor should type over closing quotes or brackets.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether the editor should type over closing quotes or brackets.

trans-unit.source: Use language configurations to determine when to autoclose quotes.
trans-unit.target: Tırnakların ne zaman otomatik olarak kapanacağını belirlemek için dil yapılandırmalarını kullanın.

trans-unit.source: Autoclose quotes only when the cursor is to the left of whitespace.
trans-unit.target: Autoclose quotes only when the cursor is to the left of whitespace.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the editor should automatically close quotes after the user adds an opening quote.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether the editor should automatically close quotes after the user adds an opening quote.

trans-unit.source: The editor will not insert indentation automatically.
trans-unit.target: Editör girintiyi otomatik olarak eklemez.

trans-unit.source: The editor will keep the current line's indentation.
trans-unit.target: The editor will keep the current line's indentation.

trans-unit.source: The editor will keep the current line's indentation and honor language defined brackets.
trans-unit.target: The editor will keep the current line's indentation and honor language defined brackets.

trans-unit.source: The editor will keep the current line's indentation, honor language defined brackets and invoke special onEnterRules defined by languages.
trans-unit.target: The editor will keep the current line's indentation, honor language defined brackets and invoke special onEnterRules defined by languages.

trans-unit.source: The editor will keep the current line's indentation, honor language defined brackets, invoke special onEnterRules defined by languages, and honor indentationRules defined by languages.
trans-unit.target: The editor will keep the current line's indentation, honor language defined brackets, invoke special onEnterRules defined by languages, and honor indentationRules defined by languages.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the editor should automatically adjust the indentation when users type, paste, move or indent lines.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether the editor should automatically adjust the indentation when users type, paste, move or indent lines.

trans-unit.source: Use language configurations to determine when to automatically surround selections.
trans-unit.target: Use language configurations to determine when to automatically surround selections.

trans-unit.source: Surround with quotes but not brackets.
trans-unit.target: Surround with quotes but not brackets.

trans-unit.source: Surround with brackets but not quotes.
trans-unit.target: Surround with brackets but not quotes.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the editor should automatically surround selections.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether the editor should automatically surround selections.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the editor shows CodeLens.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether the editor shows CodeLens.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the editor should render the inline color decorators and color picker.
trans-unit.target: Düzenleyicinin satır içi renk dekoratörlerini ve renk seçiciyi gösterip göstermemesini denetler.

trans-unit.source: Enable that the selection with the mouse and keys is doing column selection.
trans-unit.target: Enable that the selection with the mouse and keys is doing column selection.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether syntax highlighting should be copied into the clipboard.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether syntax highlighting should be copied into the clipboard.

trans-unit.source: Control the cursor animation style.
trans-unit.target: İmleç animasyon stilini denetler.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the smooth caret animation should be enabled.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether the smooth caret animation should be enabled.

trans-unit.source: Controls the cursor style.
trans-unit.target: İmleç stilini denetler.

trans-unit.source: Controls the minimal number of visible leading and trailing lines surrounding the cursor. Known as 'scrollOff' or `scrollOffset` in some other editors.
trans-unit.target: Controls the minimal number of visible leading and trailing lines surrounding the cursor. Known as 'scrollOff' or `scrollOffset` in some other editors.

trans-unit.source: `cursorSurroundingLines` is enforced only when triggered via the keyboard or API.
trans-unit.target: `cursorSurroundingLines` is enforced only when triggered via the keyboard or API.

trans-unit.source: `cursorSurroundingLines` is enforced always.
trans-unit.target: `cursorSurroundingLines` is enforced always.

trans-unit.source: Controls when `cursorSurroundingLines` should be enforced.
trans-unit.target: Controls when `cursorSurroundingLines` should be enforced.

trans-unit.source: Controls the width of the cursor when `#editor.cursorStyle#` is set to `line`.
trans-unit.target: Controls the width of the cursor when `#editor.cursorStyle#` is set to `line`.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the editor should allow moving selections via drag and drop.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether the editor should allow moving selections via drag and drop.

trans-unit.source: Scrolling speed multiplier when pressing `Alt`.
trans-unit.target: Scrolling speed multiplier when pressing `Alt`.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the editor has code folding enabled.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether the editor has code folding enabled.

trans-unit.source: Use a language-specific folding strategy if available, else the indentation-based one.
trans-unit.target: Use a language-specific folding strategy if available, else the indentation-based one.

trans-unit.source: Use the indentation-based folding strategy.
trans-unit.target: Use the indentation-based folding strategy.

trans-unit.source: Controls the strategy for computing folding ranges.
trans-unit.target: Controls the strategy for computing folding ranges.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the editor should highlight folded ranges.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether the editor should highlight folded ranges.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether clicking on the empty content after a folded line will unfold the line.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether clicking on the empty content after a folded line will unfold the line.

trans-unit.source: Controls the font family.
trans-unit.target: Yazı tipi ailesini denetler.

trans-unit.source: Controls the font weight.
trans-unit.target: Yazı tipi kalınlığını denetler.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the editor should automatically format the pasted content. A formatter must be available and the formatter should be able to format a range in a document.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether the editor should automatically format the pasted content. A formatter must be available and the formatter should be able to format a range in a document.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the editor should automatically format the line after typing.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether the editor should automatically format the line after typing.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the editor should render the vertical glyph margin. Glyph margin is mostly used for debugging.
trans-unit.target: Düzenleyicinin dikey glif boşluğunu oluşturup oluşturmayacağını kontrol eder. Glif boşluğu çoğunlukla hata ayıklamak için kullanılır.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the cursor should be hidden in the overview ruler.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether the cursor should be hidden in the overview ruler.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the editor should highlight the active indent guide.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether the editor should highlight the active indent guide.

trans-unit.source: Controls the letter spacing in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Harfler arası boşluğu pixel olarak denetler.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the editor should detect links and make them clickable.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether the editor should detect links and make them clickable.

trans-unit.source: Highlight matching brackets.
trans-unit.target: Highlight matching brackets.

trans-unit.source: A multiplier to be used on the `deltaX` and `deltaY` of mouse wheel scroll events.
trans-unit.target: A multiplier to be used on the `deltaX` and `deltaY` of mouse wheel scroll events.

trans-unit.source: Zoom the font of the editor when using mouse wheel and holding `Ctrl`.
trans-unit.target: Zoom the font of the editor when using mouse wheel and holding `Ctrl`.

trans-unit.source: Merge multiple cursors when they are overlapping.
trans-unit.target: Üst üste geldiğinde çoklu imleçleri birleştir.

trans-unit.source: Maps to `Control` on Windows and Linux and to `Command` on macOS.
trans-unit.target: Windows ve Linux'da `Control` ve macOS'de `Command` ile eşleşir.

trans-unit.source: Maps to `Alt` on Windows and Linux and to `Option` on macOS.
trans-unit.target: Windows ve Linux'da `Alt` ve macOS'de `Option` ile eşleşir.

trans-unit.source: The modifier to be used to add multiple cursors with the mouse. The Go To Definition and Open Link mouse gestures will adapt such that they do not conflict with the multicursor modifier. [Read more](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/editor/codebasics#_multicursor-modifier).
trans-unit.target: The modifier to be used to add multiple cursors with the mouse. The Go To Definition and Open Link mouse gestures will adapt such that they do not conflict with the multicursor modifier. [Read more](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/editor/codebasics#_multicursor-modifier).
trans-unit.note: - `ctrlCmd` refers to a value the setting can take and should not be localized. - `Control` and `Command` refer to the modifier keys Ctrl or Cmd on the keyboard and can be localized.

trans-unit.source: Each cursor pastes a single line of the text.
trans-unit.target: Each cursor pastes a single line of the text.

trans-unit.source: Each cursor pastes the full text.
trans-unit.target: Each cursor pastes the full text.

trans-unit.source: Controls pasting when the line count of the pasted text matches the cursor count.
trans-unit.target: Controls pasting when the line count of the pasted text matches the cursor count.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the editor should highlight semantic symbol occurrences.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether the editor should highlight semantic symbol occurrences.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether a border should be drawn around the overview ruler.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether a border should be drawn around the overview ruler.

trans-unit.source: Focus the tree when opening peek
trans-unit.target: Focus the tree when opening peek

trans-unit.source: Focus the editor when opening peek
trans-unit.target: Focus the editor when opening peek

trans-unit.source: Controls whether to focus the inline editor or the tree in the peek widget.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether to focus the inline editor or the tree in the peek widget.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the Go to Definition mouse gesture always opens the peek widget.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether the Go to Definition mouse gesture always opens the peek widget.

trans-unit.source: Controls the delay in milliseconds after which quick suggestions will show up.
trans-unit.target: Controls the delay in milliseconds after which quick suggestions will show up.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the editor auto renames on type.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether the editor auto renames on type.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the editor should render control characters.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether the editor should render control characters.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the editor should render indent guides.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether the editor should render indent guides.

trans-unit.source: Render last line number when the file ends with a newline.
trans-unit.target: Dosya yeni bir satırla sona erdiğinde son satır numarasını oluşturun.

trans-unit.source: Highlights both the gutter and the current line.
trans-unit.target: Highlights both the gutter and the current line.

trans-unit.source: Controls how the editor should render the current line highlight.
trans-unit.target: Editörün mevcut çizgiyi nasıl vurgulayacağını kontrol eder.

trans-unit.source: Controls if the editor should render the current line highlight only when the editor is focused
trans-unit.target: Controls if the editor should render the current line highlight only when the editor is focused

trans-unit.source: Render whitespace characters except for single spaces between words.
Render whitespace characters only on selected text.
trans-unit.target: Render whitespace characters only on selected text.

trans-unit.source: Controls how the editor should render whitespace characters.
trans-unit.target: Controls how the editor should render whitespace characters.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether selections should have rounded corners.
trans-unit.target: Seçimlerin yuvarlak köşelere sahip olup olmadığını kontrol eder.

trans-unit.source: Controls the number of extra characters beyond which the editor will scroll horizontally.
trans-unit.target: Controls the number of extra characters beyond which the editor will scroll horizontally.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the editor will scroll beyond the last line.
trans-unit.target: Düzenleyicinin son satırın ötesine ilerleyip ilerlemeyeceğini denetler.

trans-unit.source: Scroll only along the predominant axis when scrolling both vertically and horizontally at the same time. Prevents horizontal drift when scrolling vertically on a trackpad.
trans-unit.target: Scroll only along the predominant axis when scrolling both vertically and horizontally at the same time. Prevents horizontal drift when scrolling vertically on a trackpad.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the Linux primary clipboard should be supported.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether the Linux primary clipboard should be supported.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the editor should highlight matches similar to the selection.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether the editor should highlight matches similar to the selection.

trans-unit.source: Always show the folding controls.
trans-unit.target: Always show the folding controls.

trans-unit.source: Only show the folding controls when the mouse is over the gutter.
trans-unit.target: Only show the folding controls when the mouse is over the gutter.

trans-unit.source: Controls when the folding controls on the gutter are shown.
trans-unit.target: Controls when the folding controls on the gutter are shown.

trans-unit.source: Controls fading out of unused code.
trans-unit.target: Controls fading out of unused code.

trans-unit.source: Show snippet suggestions on top of other suggestions.
trans-unit.target: Parçacık önerilerini diğer önerilerin üstünde göster.

trans-unit.source: Show snippet suggestions below other suggestions.
trans-unit.target: Parçacık önerilerini diğer önerilerin altında göster.

trans-unit.source: Show snippets suggestions with other suggestions.
trans-unit.target: Parçacık önerilerini diğer önerilerle birlikte göster.

trans-unit.source: Do not show snippet suggestions.
trans-unit.target: Parçacık önerilerini gösterme.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether snippets are shown with other suggestions and how they are sorted.
trans-unit.target: Parçacıkların diğer önerilerle gösterilip gösterilmeyeceğini ve bunların nasıl sıralanacaklarını denetler.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the editor will scroll using an animation.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether the editor will scroll using an animation.

trans-unit.source: Font size for the suggest widget. When set to `0`, the value of `#editor.fontSize#` is used.
trans-unit.target: Font size for the suggest widget. When set to `0`, the value of `#editor.fontSize#` is used.

trans-unit.source: Line height for the suggest widget. When set to `0`, the value of `#editor.lineHeight#` is used.
trans-unit.target: Line height for the suggest widget. When set to `0`, the value of `#editor.lineHeight#` is used.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether suggestions should automatically show up when typing trigger characters.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether suggestions should automatically show up when typing trigger characters.

trans-unit.source: Always select the first suggestion.
trans-unit.target: Her zaman ilk öneriyi seç.

trans-unit.source: Select recent suggestions unless further typing selects one, e.g. `console.| -> console.log` because `log` has been completed recently.
trans-unit.target: Select recent suggestions unless further typing selects one, e.g. `console.| -> console.log` because `log` has been completed recently.

trans-unit.source: Select suggestions based on previous prefixes that have completed those suggestions, e.g. `co -> console` and `con -> const`.
trans-unit.target: Select suggestions based on previous prefixes that have completed those suggestions, e.g. `co -> console` and `con -> const`.

trans-unit.source: Controls how suggestions are pre-selected when showing the suggest list.
trans-unit.target: Öneri listesi gösterilirken ön seçiminin nasıl yapılacağını denetler.

trans-unit.source: Tab complete will insert the best matching suggestion when pressing tab.
trans-unit.target: Tab complete will insert the best matching suggestion when pressing tab.

trans-unit.source: Disable tab completions.
trans-unit.target: Disable tab completions.

trans-unit.source: Tab complete snippets when their prefix match. Works best when 'quickSuggestions' aren't enabled.
trans-unit.target: Tab complete snippets when their prefix match. Works best when 'quickSuggestions' aren't enabled.

trans-unit.source: Enables tab completions.
trans-unit.target: Enables tab completions.

trans-unit.source: Inserting and deleting whitespace follows tab stops.
trans-unit.target: Inserting and deleting whitespace follows tab stops.

trans-unit.source: Characters that will be used as word separators when doing word related navigations or operations.
trans-unit.target: Sözcüklerle ilgili gezinti veya işlem yaparken kelime ayırıcı olarak kullanılacak karakterler.

trans-unit.source: Lines will never wrap.
trans-unit.target: Satırlar hiçbir zaman bir sonraki satıra kaydırılmayacak.

trans-unit.source: Lines will wrap at the viewport width.
trans-unit.target: Satırlar görüntü alanı genişliğinde bir sonraki satıra kaydırılacak.

trans-unit.source: Lines will wrap at `#editor.wordWrapColumn#`.
trans-unit.target: Lines will wrap at `#editor.wordWrapColumn#`.
trans-unit.note: - `editor.wordWrapColumn` refers to a different setting and should not be localized.

trans-unit.source: Lines will wrap at the minimum of viewport and `#editor.wordWrapColumn#`.
trans-unit.target: Lines will wrap at the minimum of viewport and `#editor.wordWrapColumn#`.
trans-unit.note: - viewport means the edge of the visible window size. - `editor.wordWrapColumn` refers to a different setting and should not be localized.

trans-unit.source: Controls how lines should wrap.
trans-unit.target: Controls how lines should wrap.
trans-unit.note: - 'off', 'on', 'wordWrapColumn' and 'bounded' refer to values the setting can take and should not be localized. - `editor.wordWrapColumn` refers to a different setting and should not be localized.

trans-unit.source: Controls the wrapping column of the editor when `#editor.wordWrap#` is `wordWrapColumn` or `bounded`.
trans-unit.target: Controls the wrapping column of the editor when `#editor.wordWrap#` is `wordWrapColumn` or `bounded`.
trans-unit.note: - `editor.wordWrap` refers to a different setting and should not be localized. - 'wordWrapColumn' and 'bounded' refer to values the different setting can take and should not be localized.

trans-unit.source: No indentation. Wrapped lines begin at column 1.
trans-unit.target: No indentation. Wrapped lines begin at column 1.

trans-unit.source: Wrapped lines get the same indentation as the parent.
trans-unit.target: Wrapped lines get the same indentation as the parent.

trans-unit.source: Wrapped lines get +1 indentation toward the parent.
trans-unit.target: Wrapped lines get +1 indentation toward the parent.

trans-unit.source: Wrapped lines get +2 indentation toward the parent.
trans-unit.target: Wrapped lines get +2 indentation toward the parent.

trans-unit.source: Controls the indentation of wrapped lines.
trans-unit.target: Controls the indentation of wrapped lines.

trans-unit.source: Assumes that all characters are of the same width. This is a fast algorithm that works correctly for monospace fonts and certain scripts (like Latin characters) where glyphs are of equal width.
trans-unit.target: Assumes that all characters are of the same width. This is a fast algorithm that works correctly for monospace fonts and certain scripts (like Latin characters) where glyphs are of equal width.

trans-unit.source: Delegates wrapping points computation to the browser. This is a slow algorithm, that might cause freezes for large files, but it works correctly in all cases.
trans-unit.target: Delegates wrapping points computation to the browser. This is a slow algorithm, that might cause freezes for large files, but it works correctly in all cases.

trans-unit.source: Controls the algorithm that computes wrapping points.
trans-unit.target: Controls the algorithm that computes wrapping points.

trans-unit.source: Close
trans-unit.target: Kapat

trans-unit.source: no lines changed
trans-unit.target: no lines changed

trans-unit.source: 1 line changed
trans-unit.target: 1 line changed

trans-unit.source: {0} lines changed
trans-unit.target: {0} lines changed

trans-unit.source: Difference {0} of {1}: original line {2}, {3}, modified line {4}, {5}
trans-unit.target: Difference {0} of {1}: original line {2}, {3}, modified line {4}, {5}
trans-unit.note: This is the ARIA label for a git diff header. A git diff header looks like this: @@ -154,12 +159,39 @@. That encodes that at original line 154 (which is now line 159), 12 lines were removed/changed with 39 lines. Variables 0 and 1 refer to the diff index out of total number of diffs. Variables 2 and 4 will be numbers (a line number). Variables 3 and 5 will be "no lines changed", "1 line changed" or "X lines changed", localized separately.

trans-unit.source: blank
trans-unit.target: boş

trans-unit.source: {0} original line {1} modified line {2}
trans-unit.target: {0} original line {1} modified line {2}

trans-unit.source: + {0} modified line {1}
trans-unit.target: + {0} modified line {1}

trans-unit.source: - {0} original line {1}
trans-unit.target: - {0} original line {1}

trans-unit.source: Go to Next Difference
trans-unit.target: Sonraki Farka Git

trans-unit.source: Go to Previous Difference
trans-unit.target: Sonraki Farka Git

trans-unit.source: The editor is not accessible at this time. Press {0} for options.
trans-unit.target: The editor is not accessible at this time. Press {0} for options.
